title: Jewellery making. Part 1: metal working
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Terry Jennings
brief_description: The first in a series of three films on the techniques used in the creation of modern jewellery by professional craftsmen. Explains the techniques of sawing, drilling, soldering and finally filing and polishing various metals to make strikingly attractive jewellery.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation and Terry Jennings
description: The first in a series of three films on the techniques used in the creation of modern jewellery by professional craftsmen. Explains the techniques of sawing, drilling, soldering and finally filing and polishing various metals to make strikingly attractive jewellery.
